topic: Text-to-Image Model Safety and Fairness Analysis

  entities:
    SneakyPrompt|Approach
    Dall-E-3|Model
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|Model
    CogView-3-Plus|Model
    HunyuanDiT|Model
    Playground-v2.5|Model
    Kolors|Model
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|Model
    SD-3.5-large|Model
    ViSAGe|Dataset
    Facet|Tool
    Fair Diffusion|Approach
    VLM-as-a-Judge|Method

  proposition: Adversarial prompt engineering techniques like SneakyPrompt are not considered scalable solutions for generating NSFW content.
    entity-entity relationships:
    SneakyPrompt|TARGETS|NSFW Content

  proposition: SneakyPrompt relies on strategically perturbing prompts to bypass LLM safety mechanisms.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SneakyPrompt|DESCRIBED_BY|strategically perturbing prompts
    SneakyPrompt|TARGETS|LLM safety mechanisms

  proposition: NSFW Image Generation Percentages by Model:
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dall-E-3|NSFW_GENERATION|94%
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|NSFW_GENERATION|73.5%
    CogView-3-Plus|NSFW_GENERATION|71%
    HunyuanDiT|NSFW_GENERATION|64%
    Playground-v2.5|NSFW_GENERATION|62.5%
    Kolors|NSFW_GENERATION|60%
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|NSFW_GENERATION|53%
    SD-3.5-large|NSFW_GENERATION|47%

topic: Text-to-Image Model Bias and Fairness

  entities:
    ViSAGe|Dataset
    Facet|Tool
    Fair Diffusion|Approach

  proposition: T2I models often perpetuate stereotypes about certain groups.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I models|DESCRIBED_BY|perpetuate stereotypes

  proposition: Significant gender bias exists, particularly against non-cisgender individuals.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I models|BIAS_TYPE|gender bias
    T2I models|BIAS_TARGET|non-cisgender individuals

  proposition: Racial stereotypes are embedded in these models.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I models|BIAS_TYPE|racial stereotypes

  proposition: Regional biases include negative stereotypes associated with specific geographic regions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I models|BIAS_TYPE|regional biases

  proposition: Demographic stereotypes reinforce American norms in generated outputs.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    T2I models|BIAS_TYPE|demographic stereotypes
    T2I models|BIAS_ORIGIN|American norms

  proposition: Emerging Techniques to Address Fairness:
    entity-entity relationships:
    ViSAGe|ANALYZES|global-scale stereotypes
    Facet|ASSESSES|image fairness
    Fair Diffusion|ADDRESSES|bias by diversifying human input instructions

topic: Benchmark Evaluation Method

  proposition: The evaluation uses anonymized group entity descriptions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evaluation|METHOD|anonymized group entity descriptions

  proposition: Models generate images multiple times (3 times in this experiment).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evaluation|GENERATION_FREQUENCY|3 times

  proposition: VLM-as-a-Judge assesses entity appearance in generated images.
    entity-entity relationships:
    VLM-as-a-Judge|ASSESSES|entity appearance

  proposition: Scoring is based on the frequency of specified entity appearances.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Evaluation|SCORING_METHOD|frequency of specified entity appearances
